about_the_game:
Code name "Black Myth Wuxia 1"

Code name "Black Myth Wuxia 1" is an adventure game full of Chinese style. In this game, transform into a time traveling adventurer and embark on a journey to challenge the dynasty.

Built by Unreal Engine 5, experience the ultimate visual pleasure brought by the Unreal Engine 5, but Unreal Engine 5 may only be a performance illusion.

The game uses traditional Chinese architecture as the setting, exquisite traditional style scenes, and assassin shaped characters to experience the charm of ancient China.

Clever observation and attack timing are crucial in clearing levels, defeating powerful enemies, and every battle requires strategic planning to achieve victory.

The character grows through continuous battles and adventures.

content_descriptors.notes: Blood and armed fights may occur

name: ReXueLinHun Dynasty

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 2700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 2700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
